entry.title: New release for NewsBlur: Android v13.4.0
entry.content: https://github.com/samuelclay/NewsBlur/issues/1933 Option to choose tag when saving a story https://github.com/samuelclay/NewsBlur/issues/1932 Fetch story original text on demand https://github.com/samuelclay/NewsBlur/issues/1921 Fix ConcurrentModificationException in the Stories Type Adapter https://github.com/samuelclay/NewsBlur/issues/1922 Partial cursor management
